about.title: Designing innovative digital solutions
about.description: As a full stack developer with over two years of experience, I design and build modern, functional, and engaging digital experiences. I specialize in web technologies such as React, Next.js, Node.js, and TypeScript, creating efficient and scalable solutions.
about.addition: In addition, I have experience in graphic design, contributing to the creation of logos, visual identities, and graphic elements that complement the final product. This allows me to offer end-to-end solutions that not only look professional and impactful but also work flawlessly.
